title: My life is complete, the Ghost Poro mastery has the best easter egg ever
body:
The Poros, when spawned by Braum, grow mustaches.

Thank you Riot!!!

https://imgur.com/O2N4tg4

Forgive me for the potato quality picture, its hard to take pictures of things in brushes properly, I'm also sorry about my healthbar, I forgot to remove it

replies.body:
Not. One. Bit. Surprised.

At least I had faith in riot putting that in game.
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bBeSi-ODfJk](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bBeSi-ODfJk)
{{champion:202}}: _"PERFECTION"_
And now that you've reached four upvotes, I'm not letting you get anymore.

I am not, however




some people like to watch the world burn
balance has been restored {{champion:98}} would be proud
{{champion:238}} Balance is a fool's weakness
{{champion:245}} "Not quitting until it's right!"

I downvoted myself just to make it unbalanced.

{{champion:45}} suffering awaits
{{champion:17}} Captain teemo on  duty !
{{champion:222}} rules are made to be broken.

Wait you can downvote yourself?

_Edit: wow it's real_


_But why would you need that option? _
to destroy the balance that is 4 upvotes

THE FOURS REIGN SUPREME!!!    

https://gyazo.com/5409298674286e8d84dbb4929a27308d
time for some more {{champion:62}} business
BRB on my pbe account :P
your efforts are futile.
apparently they are since I can't upvote on my PBE account :(

I'm going to downvote my own comment, just so I only have 3 upvotes. Fuck you, shen. I get the last laugh. 
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/8e/8e2b5a46c526a2ffbdf93acdf30b5506e1297f4683afd30cf32bbd1b3bd46813.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=LiteUpSketchers,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oxnxAWiv,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-11-08T21:17:07.933+0000)
>
> And now that you've reached four upvotes, I'm not letting you get anymore.

Looks like you've reached 4 downvotes xd.
Free four upvotes /downvotes pls.
Downvoted to get it to four upvotes
this just made my whole freaking day xD
you just made my day too! :D

{{champion:33}} Rito : "OK"


{{sticker:sg-syndra}}
A little bit of good in a whole lotta bad

Riot needs some positivity :D
I'm really enjoying the changes personally and learning to work with them, but this ones my favorite and it made the adaptation process alot easier for me .

Thank you for being a beacon of light at a time when all other gameplay threads are so dark.
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}

I knew my love of Braum and Poros would come in handy someday.
 As soon as I saw the Ghost Poro I was like "I wonder..." and immediately after, made a custom game and spawned four of these things, each time , they grew staches.

It requires walking back into the brush to get them to spawn the stache but they do it and it makes me so happy.

I even made an alternate tank support  runepage just so I could use it on Braum.

> made a custom game and spawned four of these things


{{champion:202}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Best Rune ever!
The one good thing about this patch!
I guess they did something right...

I love Braum so much that I also had to share this with you guys:
I have a cosplay character of him I run around GW2 as.
https://78.media.tumblr.com/d091de4b0ca5eeee64f5c29480a62700/tumblr_osq8jdnTgZ1u6jjrjo1_1280.jpg

He uses a shield and everything, he's mostly for providing buffs to allies as well
Just 1 step closer to [Dawngate](https://youtu.be/i_ZLs33OifU?t=3m10s).
